amendment.description: Amendment provides a distribution of funds among Appalachian states for reclamation of abandoned mine lands in conjunction with economic and community development, offset by funds from the Environmental Programs and Management account.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Griffith amendment (A004) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Griffith amendment (A004) Agreed to by voice vote.
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A004) offered by Mr. Griffith.
